Other artifacts and enchantments have no abilities as long as they are tapped.

Time Marauder VH1
X 0 Artifact Creature - Construct 1/1 2 Vanishing X (This creature enters the battlefield with X time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.) Whenever you remove a time counter from Time Marauder, put a +1/+1 counter on another creature you control.
Chandra, Consulate Enforcer VH1 U Chandra, Harsh Suppressor 1UU 3 Legendary Creature - Human Wizard 2/2 2 Whenever you cast a blue spell, untap Chandra, Consulate Enforcer. T: Tap up to one target creature. If this ability was activated three or more times this turn, exile Chandra, then return her to the battlefield transformed under her owner’s control. --- (Back): Chandra, Harsh Suppressor
Chandra, Harsh Suppressor VH1 U
3 Legendary Planeswalker - Chandra 4 1 [+1]: Scry 1, then draw a card. [-2]: Tap target permanent. It doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step. [-7]: Tap all permanents you don’t control. Each opponent gets an emblem with “You can’t untap more than one permanent during your untap step.” --- (Front): Chandra, Consulate Enforcer

Mishra, Phyrexian Pawn VH1 B 2B 3 Legendary Creature - Phyrexian Artificer 3/2 2 T, Sacrifice an artifact: Add CCC. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts. Whenever an artifact card is put into a graveyard from anywhere, each opponent loses 1 life.
Yawgmoth's Will VH1 B 2B 3 Sorcery 3 Until end of turn, you may play lands and cast spells from your graveyard. If a card would be put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn, exile that card instead.
Reveler's Scorn VH1 R RR 2 Enchantment 1 Whenever an opponent casts a noncreature spell, Reveler’s Scorn deals 2 damage to that player.
Iona, Shield of Tazeem VH1 G 2G 3 Legendary Creature - Angel 2/2 2 Flying Your opponents can’t cast artifact spells.

2 2 Artifact Creature - Scarecrow 1/3 2 All cards that aren’t on the battlefield, spells, and permanents are colorless.
Enlightened Tutor VH1 W W 1 Instant 3 Search your library for an artifact or enchantment card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.
lava barb VH1 R R 1 Instant 3 lava barb deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)
Lightning Bolt VH1 R R 1 Instant 3 Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.
Cathar Commando VH1 W 1W 2 Creature - Human Soldier 3/1 2 Flash 1, Sacrifice Cathar Commando: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
Swords to Plowshares VH1 W W 1 Instant 3 Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

Price of Progress VH1 R 1R 2 Instant 3 Price of Progress deals damage to each player equal to twice the number of nonbasic lands that player controls.
Veil of Summer VH1 G G 1 Instant 3 Draw a card if an opponent has cast a blue or black spell this turn. Spells you control can’t be countered this turn. You and permanents you control gain hexproof from blue and from black until end of turn.

2 2 Instant 3 Counter target spell if it’s colorless or if its mana value is greater than the number of lands its controller controls.

Time Vault VH1
2 2 Artifact 1 Time Vault enters the battlefield tapped. Time Vault doesn’t untap during your untap step. If you would begin your turn while Time Vault is tapped, you may skip that turn instead. If you do, untap Time Vault. T: Take an extra turn after this one.
